title: Unlocking Africa’s potential to create wealth from agriculture (African Development Bank Group)
text: ( Source : African Development Bank Group ) by Akinwumi Adesina, President , African Development Bank There is an unbelievable contrast today in Africa : How can a continent with such an abundance of arable land, water and sunshine annually
